subject: Hello,
body:
Hello,
I pray this crucial notice meets you well. In  any work, punctuality
is one of the key factors of success. Either you run your own business
or you are an employee of someone. And for the reason of maintaining
appropriate timing, I'll provide you with all the money required for
expenses in this project, the money will be posted to you via FedEx
and tracking number provided. No out of your pocket expenses is
required, no Upfront fee is required from you on this from start to
finish. No Bank check as all our dealing will be only CASH
TRANSACTION.
On enquiry, I was told by the handling Agency that I will cost me the
sum of $1000 as the only "handling-Charges" for the sum of $1.5Million
to be brought successfully to your city for my investment in property
purchase. Actually, I have concluded my plans beforehand to forward
you the sum of $1000 in cash via usps courier service to you before
anything starts. Upon receipt of the $1000 cash, you will keep it till
the
agency will direct you on where to send it for settlement of all
requirements before bringing in the main sum of $1.5Million to you.
This business is for US CITIZENS alone or you have a reliable someone
to represent you judiciously.
My compensation goes like this, once the $1.5Million gets to your
address, you'll be required to take $300k as my appreciation for a job
well done when you  keep $1.2Million aside for me,  - Actually, my
wife and I will make a trip to meet you this Christmas for buying a
property in your city where we'll retire. We've worked in Europe for
35 years where this $1.5Million savings came from and we want to use
it properly as our retirement fund.  Can I trust you on this?
I remain obidient while waiting to hear back from you soon,
Rgds,
Phillips Williams.

subject: Re:   Hello,
body:
Hello Phillips Williams,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this information with me. It's quite an interesting proposition you have there. I'm a bit curious about the details though, could you please clarify a few things for me?

Firstly, I'd like to understand more about the project itself. What exactly does it entail? And what would my role be in all of this?

Secondly, you mentioned that no upfront fee is required from me, which is reassuring. However, I'm not entirely clear on how the money will be transferred. Could you explain a bit more about the process?

Lastly, it's great to hear that you're planning to retire in my city! It's a wonderful place. Do you already have some properties in mind or are you still looking?

Looking forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Blanca
